name: vscode-taskexplorer
description: Manage tasks for npm, vscode, ant, gradle, grunt, gulp, batch, bash, make, python, perl, powershell, ruby, and nsis

scripts.babel:watch: nodemon -e js,ts,json --watch src --watch .babelrc.js --exec "(babel src --out-dir out --extensions '.js,.ts'; exit 0)"
scripts.nyc-test-babel: npm run test && nyc report && nyc report --reporter=lcov
scripts.nyc-test-babel-before: set BABEL_ENV=coverage && rimraf .nyc_output && rimraf test-reports && rimraf coverage && rimraf c:\code\data\user-data\cacheddata && npm run build-babel && npm run coverage-full-on
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.testbefore: rimraf test-reports && rimraf coverage && rimraf c:\code\data\user-data\cacheddata && npm run compile && npm run coverage-full-on
